cn.title: 关于暂停支持 COCOS 币种的公告

message.data: 因 COCOS 官方在近期升级中节点存在异常，同时 COCOS 官方一直未能修复此问题，致使比特派钱包无法获取相关节点数据。
比特派决定停止 COCOS 相关业务支持，持有 COCOS 的用户资产安全不会受此影响，可将 COCOS 私钥导入官方钱包进行后续操作。
导入官方钱包教程：https://www.yuque.com/docs/share/054a057d-bdb2-48b7-9140-e3a7ba3520ed
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Announcement on suspension of support for COCOS

message.data: Due to the abnormality of the node during the recent upgrade of COCOS, and COCOS has not been fixed this issue, Bitpie Wallet cannot obtain relevant node.
Bitpie decided to stop COCOS-related support, and the security of COCOS will not be affected by this. The COCOS private key can be imported into the official wallet for subsequent operations.
Tutorial of Importing to official wallet:https://www.yuque.com/docs/share/054a057d-bdb2-48b7-9140-e3a7ba3520ed
